mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CPRIVATEDATA (MEMBERID, ID, PW, NAME, BIRTH, GENDERBOOLEAN, PHONENUM, MAINADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS, MAINRECEIPTADDRESS, DETAILRECEIPTADDRESS, EMAIL) VALUES (#{memberid}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{genderboolean}, #{phonenum}, #{mainaddress}, #{detailaddress}, #{mainreceiptaddress}, #{detailreceiptaddress},#{email})
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM CPRIVATEDATA WHERE MEMBERID=#{MemberID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CPRIVATEDATA WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CPRIVATEDATA WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
SELECT EMAIL FROM CPRIVATEDATA c INNER JOIN BSALES b ON c.MEMBERID=b.MEMBERID WHERE ESTID=#{estid} AND SALECODE=#{salecode}
